arguments.response_text: All right. I think we really love Friendsgiving because we get to spend time with friends and I also love Thanksgiving because we get to spend time with our family. Yeah. I think that's a really special tradition we have in America where we get to celebrate with our family and then enjoy the people we love in our life. Yeah. Cool.
arguments.response_summary: The speaker expresses love for Friendsgiving and Thanksgiving, emphasizing spending time with friends and family.
arguments.matched_prompt: What are your favorite cultural traditions?
